definition: to drift about/to wander/to roam/nomadic/homeless/unsettled (e.g. population)/vagrant
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
wave/breaker/unrestrained/dissipated/to stroll/to ramble
tramp/wanderer
rover/vagabond/vagrant/wanderer
street urchin/waif
stray dog

sentences.english: The life imbroglio of his home, he resembles a waifs and strays same.
sentences.chinese: 他家的生活一團糟，他就像個流浪兒一樣。

sentences.english: You're looking at a guy who could very well get stood up by a stray cat tonight.
sentences.chinese: 在你面前是一位今晚很可能被流浪貓放鴿子的男士。

sentences.english: In my vagabond years most derelicts seemed to be white.
sentences.chinese: 在我流浪那些年，大多數被遺棄的男人好像都是白人。

sentences.english: That was the beauty of it.
sentences.chinese: 這就是流浪的美之所在。

sentences.english: With the Mimosa Large hobo you can switch from a shoulder bag to cross-body in seconds.
sentences.chinese: 隨着含羞草大流浪漢可以切換橫身在幾秒鐘內從肩袋。

sentences.english: WANT to set down some general remarks about tramps .
sentences.chinese: 就流浪漢問題，我想談幾點粗略的看法。

sentences.english: There's homeless people around Yale and New Haven.
sentences.chinese: 耶魯和紐黑文附近有流浪漢。

sentences.english: beyond travel, vagabonding is an outlook on life.
sentences.chinese: 流浪超越了旅行的概念，它是一種人生觀。

sentences.english: Fuck the squeegee men dirtying up the clean windshield of my car.
sentences.chinese: 該死的那個弄髒我車窗的流浪漢。

sentences.english: Caption : BEIJING, CHINA - A daily moment of hutong named:weijia, during the early winter in beijing. a homeless cat on a window.
sentences.chinese: 北京初冬時節衚衕裏日常生活，一隻流浪貓在窗臺上。

sentences.english: Homeless people in the dictionary, there is no loneliness, not lonely.
sentences.chinese: 在流浪人的詞典裏，沒有寂寞，沒有孤獨。

sentences.english: Christlike vagrant wanders through a perverse and grotesque land filled with religious and sacrilegious imagery.
sentences.chinese: 像督流浪滿宗教瀆聖象異墮落遊蕩。

sentences.english: Small-town girl meets mysterious drifter boy, they fall in love.
sentences.chinese: 小鎮的女孩，男孩遇到神祕流浪漢，他們墜入愛河。
這種現象，有時叫做流浪癖。

sentences.english: Being un-castrated is one of the highest risk factors for mortality in free-roaming cats.
sentences.chinese: 不閹割，是散養或流浪貓死亡的高危因素。

sentences.english: Tom drifts from town to town.

definition: to drift (in the tide)/to rove/to lead a wandering existence/drifter/wanderer

homeless
to leave/to abandon
to offer shelter/to have sb in one's care
to roam about/to wander without a home
to regard the four corners of the world all as home (idiom)/to feel at home anywhere/to roam about unconstrained/to consider the entire country, or world, to be one's own
to beg/to go begging
foreign land/a place far from home
to wander about destitute/to be stranded
to glean/to collect scraps/to eke out a meager living
to roam far and wide (idiom)/to travel the world
